Major_Arcs.title: Early Troubles in Alley Oop's World
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces early conflicts and problems in Alley Oop's world, including King Guz's drowning, Bronto's bumping issues, and the initial idea of trading in a dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Drowning and Debt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers King Guz's drowning incident, his rescue by Alley, and the immediate aftermath where Guz confronts Alley about a past debt.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Bumping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Bronto's unusual behavior of bumping into trees and Alley's discussion with Dinny about the possible cause.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Idea & Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the initial suggestion of trading in Alley Oop's dinosaur and the subsequent visit to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's experience at the dinosaur dealership, from evaluating a new dinosaur to taking a test drive and ultimately purchasing it.

sub_scenes.title: Evaluating and Testing a New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Alley Oop's initial evaluation of a smaller dinosaur, the salesman's offer of a test drive, and the test drive itself.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive Mishap and Purchase Completion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the mishap during the test drive, the unexpected deal closure, and the old dinosaur's sad reaction to being replaced.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Old Dinny and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the farewell to the old dinosaur, Alley's reflection on the trade, and the start of a journey with the new dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic and Social Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers a series of comedic and somewhat absurd social and romantic interactions, including dinosaur sales, mistaken identities, and relationship troubles.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Roar and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a dinosaur sales pitch, a bumpy test ride, and the surprising revelation of identity through a roar.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Dinny's mistreatment by a caveman, his escape, and the ensuing chase.

sub_scenes.title: Cooola and Alley's Fishing Dispute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Alley's invitation to Cooola for fishing, her rejection, and the subsequent argument and surprising rock fall.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing, Romance, and Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of fishing, romantic jealousy, and rivalries, featuring both humorous misogynistic commentary and intense romantic conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial misogynistic observations and the disturbance of fishing by a noisy caveman.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

sub_scenes.title: Oola and Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a scenario of romantic competition, where Oola is potentially wooing another man's woman, leading to observation and confirmation.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Fight and Romantic Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a jealous fight between cavemen over a woman, and the woman's explicit romantic choice.

Major_Arcs.title: Pozy's Romantic Education and Failures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Pozy's attempt to learn and apply 'romance' to win back Cherie, resulting in comedic and disastrous failures.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Strategy and Mimicry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Pozy learning about 'romance' and deciding to mimic Koko's romantic gestures.

sub_scenes.title: Botanical Blunder and Backfire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Pozy's disastrous attempt to present flowers to Cherie, leading to a crocodile mishap and further rejection.

Major_Arcs.title: Comic Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases humorous misunderstandings, primarily around romantic contexts and actions, leading to comical consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Finger Bite Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores a flashback revealing possessive jealousy, followed by a comical misunderstanding where a kiss leads to an accusation of cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Marital Spats and Romantic Turn
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features various instances of marital discord and infidelity accusations, culminating in Alley's decision to become romantic.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the new dance craze 'the twitch', its dangers, social pressures, and ultimately, its unexpectedly humorous consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Dangers and Social Pressure of the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'twitch' dance, its physical risks, and the social pressure to participate, especially for 'grown-ups'.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lessons and Performance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Alley's attempt to learn the 'twitch' at a dance studio, his clumsy lesson, and his subsequent performance and humiliation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge
Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Hospitalization from Watching the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the absurd consequence of the 'twitch' dance: people are getting injured not from doing it, but from watching it.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel and Romantic Distraction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel initiated for research purposes but quickly shifts to romantic pursuits and comedic interruptions.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Plan for Research
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the plan to use a time machine to gather information about ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop's romantic activities in the past and the scholar's attempt to bring him back, leading to an unexpected transportation during a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation

sub_scenes.title: Spain Assignment and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Wonmug's explanation of the Spain assignment and the characters' return to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

Major_Arcs.title: Ancient Spain and Bullfighting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop and Wonmug in ancient Spain, leading to a serenade mishap, mistaken identity, and an unconventional bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Serenade Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts their arrival in Spain and Alley Oop's attempt to serenade a woman, leading to a violent intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Matador Identity and Unconventional Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the consequences of attacking Don Jose, leading to Alley Oop unexpectedly becoming a bullfighter.

Major_Arcs.title: Return Home and Romantic Irony
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Alley Oop's return from Spain, the anticipation of a promised kiss, and the ironic and comedic denial of that kiss due to a misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Return and Promised Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the setup for Alley Oop's return, the woman's promise of a kiss for bravery, and his rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Learned Lesson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes with the woman's jealous accusation and Alley Oop's ironic realization about the kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and its Discontents
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day', the unexpected challenges of temporary kingship, and domestic issues with Queen Oompa.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Concept and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept and the initial challenge to the crowned king, leading to a temporary appointment.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Respect and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the crowned king's departure, the instruction for respect, the ironic misinterpretation of 'respect', and the aftermath of the rock-throwing incident.

sub_scenes.title: Queen Oompa's Domestic Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features King Guz's humorous and unpleasant experience under Queen Oompa's domestic 'kingship', highlighting household conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification
Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

Major_Arcs.title: King's Daily Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases the daily problems and frustrations of being king, including resolving disputes, financial issues, and even dining displeasures.

sub_scenes.title: Multiple Disputes and Clam Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces multiple disputes requiring the king's attention, focusing on the conflict over found clams.

sub_scenes.title: King's Financial and Dining Frustrations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the king dealing with outdoor chaos, financial frustrations with his advisor, and dining displeasure due to his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: Random Encounters and Absurdities
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc compiles a collection of somewhat random and absurd encounters, from apologies and ruler offers to strange measurements and forced shaving, showcasing the varied and whimsical nature of the comic.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Relief from Rulership, and Ruler Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene groups together seemingly unrelated events: an apology, a character relieved to be out of power, and an unexpected offer of rulership.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is dedicated to a single sub-scene involving a time machine malfunction and its comedic consequence.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a man's attempt to use a time machine, leading to an unexpected Roman soldier and machine malfunction.
